messages.name: Juan Dela Cruz
messages.text: Good morning! I would like to know how I can book an appointment for a general check-up. Also, what documents do I need to bring?

messages.name: Maria Santos
messages.text: When is the next community vaccine schedule? My child missed the last session.

messages.name: Dr. Reyes
messages.text: The next vaccination schedule is on August 25, 2025, from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Please bring your child's vaccination record.

messages.name: Maria Santos
messages.text: Thank you! We'll be there.

messages.name: Pedro Garcia
messages.text: I need to refill my blood pressure medication (Amlodipine 10mg). My current supply will run out in 3 days.

messages.name: Pedro Garcia
messages.text: Also, I've been experiencing some dizziness lately. Should I be concerned?

messages.name: Ana Rodriguez
messages.text: Can I get my lab results from last week's blood chemistry test?

messages.name: Nurse Linda
messages.text: Your results are ready. Please visit the clinic between 8 AM - 5 PM to collect them. Bring a valid ID.

messages.name: Carlos Mendoza
messages.text: How can I register for the diabetes management program? What are the requirements?

messages.name: Dr. Cruz
messages.text: You can register at our clinic. Please bring your medical records, recent lab results, and a completed health assessment form.

messages.name: Carlos Mendoza
messages.text: Where can I get the health assessment form?

messages.name: Isabella Torres
messages.text: What is the emergency contact number for after-hours medical emergencies?

messages.name: Admin Staff
messages.text: For life-threatening emergencies, call 911. For urgent medical concerns, our 24/7 hotline is (043) 778-1234.

messages.name: Roberto Silva
messages.text: What are the consultation fees for general check-up and specialist consultation?

messages.name: Roberto Silva
messages.text: Also, do you accept PhilHealth and private health insurance?

messages.name: Sofia Morales
messages.text: I need a medical certificate for work absence due to flu. What's the process?

messages.name: Dr. Martinez
messages.text: Please visit the clinic with your ID and medical records. The certificate will be ready within 1 hour. Fee is ₱150.

messages.name: Miguel Fernandez
messages.text: I need regular blood pressure monitoring. What's the schedule and do I need an appointment?

messages.name: Nurse Carmen
messages.text: BP monitoring is available every Tuesday and Thursday, 8 AM - 12 PM. No appointment needed, walk-ins welcome.

messages.name: Miguel Fernandez
messages.text: Is there a fee for this service?

messages.name: Carmen Lopez
messages.text: What prenatal care services do you offer? I'm 8 weeks pregnant.

messages.name: Dr. Santos
messages.text: We offer complete prenatal care: monthly check-ups, ultrasound, nutritional counseling, and birthing classes. Please schedule your first visit.

messages.name: Antonio Ramirez
messages.text: Do you provide dental services at the health center? I need tooth extraction.

messages.name: Lucia Herrera
messages.text: What vaccines does my 2-year-old need according to the DOH schedule?

messages.name: Nurse Patricia
messages.text: At 2 years, your child needs MMR second dose, Varicella, and Hepatitis A vaccines. Please bring the vaccination card.

messages.name: Ricardo Vega
messages.text: What health programs are available for senior citizens? I'm 68 years old.

messages.name: Elena Castro
messages.text: What family planning methods are available at your center? Do you provide free consultations?

messages.name: Gabriel Ortiz
messages.text: Do you offer mental health counseling services? I've been dealing with anxiety and depression.

messages.name: Francisca Delgado
messages.text: I need nutritional counseling for weight management. What programs do you have?

messages.name: Alejandro Ruiz
messages.text: Do you provide physical therapy services? I need rehabilitation after knee surgery.

messages.name: Beatriz Navarro
messages.text: When is the next breast cancer screening program? I'm 45 years old.

messages.name: Dr. Luna
messages.text: Our next screening is scheduled for September 15, 2025. Registration starts August 20. Please bring valid ID and health records.

messages.name: Fernando Jimenez
messages.text: I would like to get tested for diabetes. What's the procedure and cost?

messages.name: Nurse Rosa
messages.text: Diabetes screening includes FBS and random blood sugar tests. Cost is ₱200. Available Monday-Friday, 6-8 AM (fasting required).

messages.name: Valentina Guerrero
messages.text: I was recently diagnosed with hypertension. What management programs do you offer?

messages.name: Dr. Fernandez
messages.text: We have a comprehensive hypertension management program including medication, lifestyle counseling, and regular monitoring. Please schedule a consultation.

messages.name: Rodrigo Medina
messages.text: Do you offer eye examination services? I'm having vision problems.

messages.name: Dr. Vision
messages.text: Yes, we have ophthalmology services every Wednesday. Please call (043) 778-1234 to schedule an appointment.

messages.name: Adriana Moreno
messages.text: I need TB screening for employment. What documents do I need?

messages.name: Nurse Miguel
messages.text: For TB screening, bring valid ID and chest X-ray request from employer. Screening is available daily 8 AM - 4 PM.

messages.name: Esteban Vargas
messages.text: I have a diabetic foot ulcer that needs regular dressing. Do you provide wound care?

messages.name: Nurse Ana
messages.text: Yes, we provide wound care services. Please visit our clinic daily for proper wound dressing and monitoring.

messages.name: Natalia Romero
messages.text: When is the next cervical cancer screening program? I'm 35 years old.

messages.name: Dr. Maria
messages.text: Cervical screening is available every Friday. Please schedule an appointment. Bring valid ID and wear comfortable clothing.

messages.name: Mauricio Herrera
messages.text: I need a health certificate for international travel. What's required?

messages.name: Dr. Travel
messages.text: For travel health certificate, you need medical examination, chest X-ray, and recent lab tests. Processing takes 2-3 days.

messages.name: Lorena Aguilar
messages.text: Do you have smoking cessation programs? I want to quit smoking.

messages.name: Dr. Wellness
messages.text: Yes, we offer smoking cessation counseling every Tuesday. Group sessions and individual counseling available. Call to register.

messages.name: Sergio Peña
messages.text: When is the next blood donation drive? I want to donate blood.

messages.name: Nurse Blood
messages.text: Our next blood donation drive is August 30, 2025, 8 AM - 4 PM. Donors must be 18-65 years old and in good health.

messages.name: Diana Castillo
messages.text: My 10-year-old is overweight. Do you have programs for childhood obesity?

messages.name: Nutritionist Joy
messages.text: We have a pediatric nutrition program with diet counseling and physical activity guidance. Please schedule a consultation.

messages.name: Armando Silva
messages.text: I need kidney function tests. What tests are included and what's the cost?

messages.name: Dr. Kidney
messages.text: Kidney function tests include creatinine, BUN, and urinalysis. Total cost is ₱800. Results available in 24 hours.

messages.name: Pilar Mendez
messages.text: I have arthritis in my hands. What treatment options are available?

messages.name: Dr. Rheumatology
messages.text: We offer arthritis management including medication, physical therapy, and lifestyle counseling. Please schedule a consultation for proper assessment.

messages.name: Octavio Ramos
messages.text: Do you offer allergy testing? I have frequent allergic reactions but don't know the cause.

messages.name: Dr. Allergy
messages.text: Yes, we offer skin prick tests and blood allergy panels. Please schedule an appointment. Avoid antihistamines 48 hours before testing.

messages.name: Remedios Santos
messages.text: What specialized care do you provide for elderly patients? My mother is 85 years old.

messages.name: Dr. Geriatrics
messages.text: We offer comprehensive geriatric care including health assessment, medication management, and fall prevention programs. Schedule a consultation.

messages.name: Esperanza Flores
messages.text: I gave birth 2 weeks ago. What postpartum care services do you provide?

messages.name: Midwife Carmen
messages.text: We provide postpartum check-ups, breastfeeding support, newborn care guidance, and family planning counseling. Please visit for assessment.

messages.name: Teodoro Vidal
messages.text: I need Hepatitis B vaccination for work. Is it available and what's the schedule?

messages.name: Nurse Vaccine
messages.text: Hepatitis B vaccine is available. It's a 3-dose series: initial, 1 month, and 6 months later. Cost is ₱500 per dose.

messages.name: Milagros Cruz
messages.text: I'm experiencing hearing loss. Do you offer hearing tests?

messages.name: Dr. ENT
messages.text: Yes, we have ENT services with audiometry testing every Monday. Please schedule an appointment for proper evaluation.
